title: Pixel 3 (XL) limited wallpaper choice?
content: I have the pixel 3 XL and the other pixel 4a and pixel 2 XL in my household both have a greater variety of live and still wallpapers included in the phone. I, with the pixel 3 XL have limited options. Is there a way to attain these simply or will I have to seek an outside source to download these wallpapers?
